netEnabled.description: Network subsystem state, it is not recomended to enable network, it may cause your emulator to crash.

netMAC.description:
You should specify your host adapter MAC address here. This adapter will be used for network connection to game's servers. This option is ignored if "netEnabled" set to `false`.

00:00:00:00:00:00 means "first available adapter with IPv4 address".

onlineUsers.description: This option specifies the number of logged in users. The maximum number of users is 4. Every user must have their own configured gamepad (see controls.json).

profiles.description: This array contains information about all the console users. The specified name and lightbar color will be sent to the game on request.

name.description: The displayed user name, the game may draw it somewhere.

systemlang.description:
The game language, defaults to EnglishUS. Game must support it.
 Languages list: <https://github.com/SysRay/psOff_public/wiki/Config-files#generaljson>.

userIndex.description: Index of the user who launched the game, should be less than "onlineUsers" or equal.
